page.title: 02SEC 2 - WEST SIDE ULLSWATER
page.content:
Section 2
West Side of Ullswater
This area consists of undulating farmland and several mixed plantations and includes part of Salmon's Plantation - a hill mainly covered with deciduous trees which borders the lakeside road (A.592) ECOLOGY - Alongside the A.592 and slightly above continues a footpath from the corner of the Dalemain road to Floshgate Cottage where the footpath ends
LOCAL HISTORY - In this area is Maiden Castle and ancient earthwork of approximately 270 metres above sea-level.
EMPLOYMENT - Farming
